# UIWindowScene.PresentationStyle.automatic

**Case**

The system determines the most appropriate style.

## Declaration

```swift
case automatic
```

## Constants

- **UIWindowScene.PresentationStyle.prominent**: Presents prominently above others in the current space.
- **UIWindowScene.PresentationStyle.standard**: The default style of the system.
